body: I wonder if `input_lengths` and `target_lengths` should be `IntList`s. It would be more consistent with the rest of our APIs (e.g., `PackedSequence`).
body_html: I wonder if input_lengths and target_lengths should be IntLists. It would be more consistent with the rest of our APIs (e.g., PackedSequence).
body_text: I wonder if input_lengths and target_lengths should be IntLists. It would be more consistent with the rest of our APIs (e.g., PackedSequence).
